description:
The Legend of Zelda: Oracles of Ages is one of the rare Capcom entries to the series.
Nayru, the oracle of ages, has been possessed by Veran, and she is now making a mess in Labrynna
Gather the Essences of Times, exorcice Nayru and defeat Veran to save the timeline of Labrynna
game: The Legend of Zelda - Oracle of Ages

ooa_2.description:
### ⚠️ Disclaimer

This is an early build, not completely stable, and there is still a risk of softlock at the moment (as I was alone to test it until now). 
I recommand you to NOT use it in large game right now.

Check the [documentation](https://github.com/SenPierre/ArchipelagoOoA/tree/oos/worlds/tloz_ooa/docs) for more details

### 🎉 New features

- Keysanity !
- Dungeon shuffle !
- King zora logic changed ! You know will get a specific blue potion that is specifically used to save king zora now. This allow you to not worry about using your potion before reacing King Zora. 
- An option has been added to reduce the time playing harp and flute.
- Mermaid suit doesn't need you to spam the arrow to move, 
- The sign in front of the Maku tree now display how many essence are required to get the Maku seed, and how many slate are needed to go in D8 lowest floor.

### 🧹 Notable changes : 

- Changed 2 of the three vanilla item in GBA shop to be rupees instead of ring or gasha seed. This add more rupees in the pool
- The guard in Deku forest is now red, in order to easily spot him.
- Jabu Jabu's Belly now reset its water level when you reenter the dungeon to avoid softlock.
- As a side effect of the new potion item, Syrup now have her three spots randomized.
- Shop price have been reduced, as there is less money in circulation in labrynna than in holodrum (as they are victim of inflation)
- You can reenable tokkey dance and the kid joke via an option
- The dumbbell guy now talk less about their political orientations.

### 🛠️ Fixed bugs

- Fairies in the forest shouldn't bother you anymore
- Bomb max now properly set to 10
- Essences should be tracked
- Some locations now show their proper item : 
  - The Hidden Tokay
  - The Wild Tokay Minigame
- The warp option should now show the proper inputs
- The warp to start should be easier to execute
- The fade to white to the inventory should stop creating weird graphical artifacts
- Deku Forest soldier logic should be less restrictive
- D6 Present Compass should stop showing a map sprite
- The Management fixed their sign on Crescent Island.
- Vasu won't be able to create a telepathic link to you each time you get a ring.
- Fixed the GBA option description
- Fixed lynna tree to have the proper default seed.

### 🪲 Notable known bugs :

- Some locations doesn't show their item properly (and show instead the vanilla item). This include :
    - Cheval Invention
    - Cheval Test
    - Past Library
    - Present Library
    - Patch Tuni Nut Ceremony
    - Patch Broken Sword Ceremony
- Progressive Shield doesn't work properly if you lose your shield to a like-like
- Trees aren't properly tracked
- Cheating in an essence break the second screen of the inventory (Please don't)
- Gasha trees are turbo broken
- send_location command doesn't seems to work properly with the trees
- Some key door are only locked in one side, which create situation when you enter a screen and you are softlock if don't have the key.
- Can't call animal in fixed symmetry

### Fixed between 0.2.0 and 0.2.1

- Fixed Satchel Upgrade Text
- Fixed Shooter corrupting the harp ~~(side effect : Now seed shooter refill your seeds)~~
- Fixed issue with D6 Boss key.
- Fixed Syrup slot 1 that you could buy again and again
- Fixed import issue.

### Fixed between 0.2.1 and 0.2.2

- Fixed the seed shooter so it doesn't upgrade your satchel (and removed that side effect from previous update)
- Fixed the default seed AGAIN.

### Fixed between 0.2.2 and 0.2.3

- Fixed D6 object being swapped between present and past in non-keysanity
- Fix Zora Reward Logic
- Fix West Past Crescent Island Logic
- Temporary remove the possibility that D4 entrance contain Maku Path (as it create a softlock if you do it in reverse)
- Maku Tree gift should now drop properly.
- Fix Maku Seed being given before the Maku Tree Gift if you have all the essence and save Nayru. (which made the Maku Tree Gift unobtainable)
- Fix Gale Seed crashing the game if you use them without visiting any tree of the period you're in.
- Fix Time travel making you drown to death if you don't have flippers.

### Fixed between 0.2.3 and 0.2.4

- Fixed a generation issue if you had key sanity active for all items, except boss keys.
ooa_2.title: Oracle of Ages 0.2.4

ooa_3.description:
### ⚠️ Disclaimer

This is an early build, not completely stable, and there is still a risk (albeit a really low one) of softlock at the moment. 
Always ask the organizer before using this game in a large session.

Check the [documentation](https://github.com/SenPierre/ArchipelagoOoA/tree/oos/worlds/tloz_ooa/docs) for more details

### 🎉 New features

* Death link is now supported

### 🧹 Notable changes : 

* Update to Archipelago 5.1
* The version of the world and the player linked to the rom is shown in the file selection screen
* Lynna shooting range now have a proper check
* D4, D5, D6 (past & present) and D7 now open automatically their door when you exit them from the maku path with a dungeon shuffle
* The Mermaid suit QOL is now an option

### 🛠️ Fixed bugs

* Fixed some key logic in D6
* Trees are now properly tracked
* Shooting gallery now work properly with Biggoron Sword
* Archipelago Progressive items should now have a fixed red hue.
* Fixed logic around crescent island
* Fixed D2 Logic (Thx to f-Razor)
* Fixed Ricky's glove logic (Thx to f-raZ0R)
 
### 🪲 Notable known bugs :

- Some locations doesn't show their item properly (and show instead the vanilla item). This include :
    - Cheval Invention
    - Cheval Test
    - Past Library
    - Present Library
    - Patch Tuni Nut Ceremony
    - Patch Broken Sword Ceremony
- Progressive Shield doesn't work properly if you lose your shield to a like-like
- Cheating in an essence break the second screen of the inventory (Please don't)
- Gasha trees are turbo broken
- send_location command doesn't seems to work properly with the trees
- Some key door are only locked in one side, which create situation when you enter a screen and you are softlock if don't have the key.
- Can't call animal in fixed symmetry (Might be vanilla ??)

### ❓Could not reproduce the following bugs : 

- If the first item is Biggoron Sword, the following item will be lost.

### Fixed between 0.3.0 and 0.3.1

- Reverted the fix on the soldier asking for mystery seed, as it generated a softlock.

### Fixed between 0.3.1 and 0.3.2

- Fixed the flag of the deku soldier
ooa_3.title: Oracle of Ages 0.3.2

ooa_4_2.description:
- Fixed a security issue with rom generation.
- Tweaked D5 logic
- Map now show the correct tree at each location
ooa_4_2.title: Oracle of Ages 0.4.3 - Quick Fixes

ooa_4_3.description: * Fixed a generation issue for archipelago 0.6.2+ (Thanks Ishigh)
ooa_4_3.title: Oracle of Ages 0.4.3.bis

ooa_4r3.description:
### ⚠️ Disclaimer

This is an early build, not perfectly stable. Always ask the organizer before using this game in a large session.

Check the [documentation](https://github.com/SenPierre/ArchipelagoOoA/tree/oos/worlds/tloz_ooa/docs) for more details

### 🎉 New features

* Master keys ! (aka Key rings)
* Compasses are now properly implemented with the chime coming from Stawmat randomizer !
* The tokays welcome you in their market ! 2 additionnal check available here.
* Ganon goal is now implemented ! (Thanks to Ishigh !)
* Impa now refill your health, seeds and bombs !
* More ring option (Thanks to OmegaZeron !)
* Sprite customization !

### 🧹 Notable changes : 

* Some option have been moved to the host.yaml settings file, check it out !
* Combat difficulty option has been added
* Heart beep settings has been added
* Rings are now affecting medium logic instead of hard.

### 🛠️ Fixed bugs

* Fixed visual of the cheval grave and library past and present's checks
* Fixed keydrop not displaying text for key in keysanity
* Fixed the shop not activating the flute when you buy it
* Shield now properly upgrade if you lost your shield to a likelike and get a new one via a check.
* Gasha trees are not turbo broken anymore

### 🪲 Notable known bugs :

- Cheating in an essence break the second screen of the inventory (Please don't)
- Some key door are only locked in one side, which create situation when you enter a screen and you are softlock if don't have the key.
- Trade items aren't displayed properly in the second screen

### ❓Could not reproduce the following bugs : 

- Nayru sprite is broken during a cinematic in ambi palace.


### Changed made in 0.4.1

- Fixed a crash in the tokay market if the left item was a archipelago progression item.
- Added topology in the spoiler

### Changed made in 0.4.2

- Fixed Sad Boi not given you its item when skipping the joke.
- Tokay market now accept that you only have the seed shooter.
- Added recompatibility feature 

Latest version is retro-compatible with world generated up to the 0.4.0 version.
ooa_4r3.title: Oracle of Ages 0.4.2
